com.example.nerdherd.Database

Class MockDatabaseAdapater

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.nerdherd.Database.DatabaseAdapter
      • com.example.nerdherd.Database.MockDatabaseAdapater

  • public class MockDatabaseAdapater
extends DatabaseAdapter
    Use this Database adapter for Testing where we don't want to mess with Firebase.
